**Share Repurchase and Market Value Impact**

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

set.seed(908)
library(webexercises)
library(knitr)

# Randomized firm parameters
shares_outstanding <- round(rnorm(1, mean = 50, sd = 5), 2)  # random number of shares outstanding (million)
stock_price <- round(rnorm(1, mean = 25, sd = 2), 2)  # random price per share (dollars)
repurchase_amount <- round(rnorm(1, mean = 100, sd = 10), 2)  # random repurchase amount (million dollars)

# Calculations
shares_repurchased <- round(repurchase_amount / stock_price, 2)  # shares repurchased in millions
shares_remaining <- round(shares_outstanding - shares_repurchased, 2)  # shares outstanding after repurchase
```

Gamma Corp. has `r shares_outstanding` million shares outstanding, and its stock is currently trading at \$`r stock_price` per share. The company plans to repurchase \$`r repurchase_amount` million worth of its own shares. Calculate: (a) the number of shares repurchased; and (b) the number of shares outstanding after the repurchase.
